name: Colorize (SSibai)
description:
Colorize is a topdown shooter PVP game that takes place in a world that lost all color. The players must repair the arena by shooting the objects with the correct color. the player that colors the most of the arena, wins. 

-Players must use the right color the icon shows to fill in objects. Be careful, the colors don't always match the logical perception of the object! 
-Points can also be stolen from other players by recoloring objects. 
-Each player has a special skill that is activated when coloring enough objects correctly, or with shooting the other player.

Developers

Mohammed Yassir Ouali & Salam Sibai

Special thanks to Mohamed Eltawil for the background music & to Abdulla Hassan for the story sketches.

This game was submitted for the Global Game Jam 2020.
